ns0:entry.ns0:title: [Amazon Web Services]Amazon Network Flow Monitoring | Amazon Web Services

ns2:group.ns2:title: Amazon Network Flow Monitoring | Amazon Web Services
ns2:group.ns2:description:
Network Flow Monitor provides near real-time visibility into network performance, such as packet loss and latency, for traffic between Amazon EC2 instances, as well as traffic toward other AWS services, such as Amazon S3 and Amazon DynamoDB, or to the edge of another AWS Region. Network Flow Monitor receives data from lightweight software agents that you install on your instances. The agents gather performance statistics from TCP connections. This data is sent to the Network Flow Monitor backend service, and the top contributors for each metric type are calculated.
Network Flow Monitor also determines if AWS is the cause of a detected network issue, and reports that information for network flows that you choose to monitor details for.
Learn more at: http://go.aws/4o3ZNdR

ns0:entry.ns0:title: [Amazon Web Services]Qcraft X AWS Testimonial Video | Amazon Web Services

ns2:group.ns2:title: Qcraft X AWS Testimonial Video | Amazon Web Services
ns2:group.ns2:description:
Exciting news from IAA Mobility: QCraft CTO Dong Li shares how they're revolutionizing autonomous driving with #AWS and #GenerativeAI!
Key highlights from our conversation: â€¢ QCraft is leveraging AI to create photorealistic scenarios for autonomous vehicle testing â€¢ Their innovative "world model" allows algorithm validation in never-before-seen scenarios â€¢ Safety and compliance are paramount - extensive simulation testing ensures reliable performance â€¢ Global expansion plans include new European headquarters in Germany "We're not just generating pictures - we're generating actions for cars to drive. This requires unprecedented attention to safety and compliance." - Dong Li, CTO QCraft
Fascinating to see how #CloudComputing and #AI are transforming the future of mobility, with safety at the forefront.
What are your thoughts on AI's role in shaping the future of autonomous driving?

ns0:entry.ns0:title: [TED]Inside Indiaâ€™s Astonishing Solar Revolution | Kanika Chawla | TED

ns2:group.ns2:title: Inside Indiaâ€™s Astonishing Solar Revolution | Kanika Chawla | TED
ns2:group.ns2:description:
In 2014, the worldâ€™s second largest coal consumer made a bold promise: to increase its solar capacity from three gigawatts to 100 gigawatts in just eight years. Many people called it overly ambitious, but energy expert Kanika Chawla saw the opportunity of a lifetime. She tells the story of how India became a solar powerhouse, turning an expensive dream into an economic reality â€” and creating a model for other countries to follow suit. (Recorded at TED Countdown Summit 2025 on June 17, 2025)

ns0:entry.ns0:title: [Kendra's Language School]Core French by Ear: 200 Essential Examples (with Explanations)

ns2:group.ns2:title: Core French by Ear: 200 Essential Examples (with Explanations)
ns2:group.ns2:description:
This video is designed to help your ear get used to French naturally, with 200 essential basic phrases.
Maybe you've already learned some grammar, but you still find it hard to understand conversations. Or perhaps you know the words, but you can't use them when you speak.
This material was created for those who are hitting that â€œfirst wallâ€ with French and want to build a solid foundation from the start.
You don't need to study complicated rules: just listen, and your ear will start to recognize French effortlessly.
These 200 phrases will give you a solid base and help you take your first step toward intermediate French.
The Only 200 French Phrases You Need to Listen, Repeat, and Never Forget https://youtu.be/TnpoW58Bt2k
1000 French Phrases All-in-One â€“ Learn Easily, Remember Forever https://youtu.be/x9XX193OudQ
Effortlessly Learn 300 French Phrases to Repeat and Memorize Forever https://youtu.be/bHQjsYc2mbA
SLOW, CLEAR & SHORT FRENCH PHRASES | Real Voice Speaking Practice https://youtu.be/h-MaaZJEyW0

ns2:group.ns2:description:
Learn how to create compelling interactive experiences for visionOS and capture immersive video in this multi-day activity.

ns0:entry.ns0:title: [TED]This clean energy solution is already live in California! #TEDTalks

ns2:group.ns2:title: This clean energy solution is already live in California! #TEDTalks
ns2:group.ns2:description: The world relies on manufacturing, and manufacturing relies on heat â€” a massive contributor to global carbon emissions, responsible for a quarter of the world's fossil fuel use. Energy entrepreneur John O'Donnell has figured out a better, cleaner way to generate the heat we need to make the stuff we want. Learn how his team turned simple bricks and iron wire into a powerful, unconventional "heat battery" that could deliver industrial heat at scale without the emissions â€” and why he thinks electrified industrial heat is the next trillion-dollar industry.

ns0:entry.ns0:title: [TED]How Your Brain Alters Your Reality (W/ Anil Seth) | How to Be a Better Human | TED

ns2:group.ns2:title: How Your Brain Alters Your Reality (W/ Anil Seth) | How to Be a Better Human | TED
ns2:group.ns2:description:
What is the aspect of being you that you cling to most tightly? Why are you you and not somebody else? How do you understand and make sense of your experiences? These are questions studied by Anil Seth, Professor of Cognitive and Computational Neuroscience and the University of Sussex. Anil and Chris reflect on the limitations in describing the brain as a â€œsupercomputer,â€ the ethical and morally grey areas of technological advancements and brain computer interfaces, and how hallucinogenic drugs affect consciousness.
Follow Host: Chris Duffy (Instagram: @chrisiduffy | chrisduffycomedy.com) Guest: Anil Seth (Instagram: @profanilseth | LinkedIn: @anilseth | Website: https://www.anilseth.com/)
Links Being You: A New Science of Consciousness

ns0:entry.ns0:title: [Amazon Web Services]Beyond the First Build: Khalil's Rapid Growth in AI | Amazon Web Services

ns2:group.ns2:title: Beyond the First Build: Khalil's Rapid Growth in AI | Amazon Web Services
ns2:group.ns2:description:
In this inspiring follow-up story, we revisit Khalil Adib, who we first met as an AI Engineer at Firemind. Since then, Khalil's rapidly advanced his career, earning a promotion to Senior AI Engineer in just 15 months - a testament to his expertise in this fast-moving field.
Watch as Khalil shares how he's navigating the evolving AI landscape, his approach to staying current with rapidly changing technologies, and how he's grown into his senior role. Learn how he balances technical innovation with practical implementation and hear his insights about building a career in AI.
This video is part of our "Beyond the First Build" series, showcasing how cloud skills can lead to dynamic career opportunities and meaningful professional growth. Join us as we explore Khalil's journey at the forefront of AI engineering.
Watch Khalil's original story: https://youtu.be/5FDYTw8CWws

ns2:group.ns2:title: M5 14â€ MacBook Pro â€“ Is It Worth Upgrading?
ns2:group.ns2:description:
Appleâ€™s latest entry-level 14-inch MacBook Pro with the M5 chip is here, and while it may look familiar, there are some solid performance gains under the hood. In this video, I go hands-on with the new model to see how it stacks up to last yearâ€™s M4 MacBook Pro and whether itâ€™s worth upgrading.
The M5 chip brings up to 15% faster CPU, 30% faster graphics, and 45% faster ray tracing compared to the M4 â€” plus new AI-focused optimizations that deliver serious boosts in real-world workloads. But is that enough to justify the upgrade? Iâ€™ll walk through benchmarks, SSD speed tests, display differences, and who this MacBook is really for.

The First Lands have long stood against great evils. Much has changedâ€¦ much has not.
The Trials of Twilight continue with Act II.

ns0:entry.ns0:title: [TED]What Happens When Your Dog Uses the Internet | Ilyena Hirskyj-Douglas | TED

ns2:group.ns2:title: What Happens When Your Dog Uses the Internet | Ilyena Hirskyj-Douglas | TED
ns2:group.ns2:description:
Imagine this: you walk into a room, and your dog is on a video call with their fellow canine friends. Computer scientist Ilyena Hirskyj-Douglas thinks the notion of a social internet for animals is not far off. She explores what happens when animals control their own technology â€” from parrots making friends online to monkeys choosing their favorite audio tracks â€” and shows how this technology transforms our understanding of animal consciousness. (Recorded at TEDxManchester on March 1, 2025)

[Barrett]I Found the Future of Power Tools at Chinaâ€™s Canton Fair 2025

ns2:group.ns2:title: I Found the Future of Power Tools at Chinaâ€™s Canton Fair 2025
ns2:group.ns2:description:
I just discovered the future of power tools â€” and itâ€™s happening right here in Guangzhou, at the worldâ€™s biggest trade fair: The Canton Fair 2025! ğŸ‡¨ğŸ‡³ From next-gen mowers to intelligent tools and unstoppable innovation, this yearâ€™s Canton Fair proves why China remains the global hub of manufacturing and creativity.
In this video, I explore the 138th China Import and Export Fair, better known as the Canton Fair, where over 32,000 companies are showcasing cutting-edge technology, intelligent manufacturing, and green energy solutions. I came across one brand that really stood out â€” redefining what outdoor power equipment can do with advanced engineering, bold design, and world-class quality.
If youâ€™ve ever wondered how Chinaâ€™s manufacturers are shaping the future of global trade â€” this is the place to see it. Join me as I take you inside the energy, innovation, and business behind the worldâ€™s largest trade fair! #CantonFair2025 #ChinaTrade #MadeInChina #Innovation #PowerTools #Manufacturing #CantonFair

ns0:entry.ns0:title: [Apple Developer]Day 1 | Create immersive media experiences for visionOS | Meet with Apple

ns2:group.ns2:title: Day 1 | Create immersive media experiences for visionOS | Meet with Apple
ns2:group.ns2:description:
Learn how to create compelling interactive experiences for visionOS and capture immersive video in this multi-day activity.
Bookmark the Day 2 livestream: https://youtube.com/live/4V_7-1bm4Rk
During this Day 1 livestream, weâ€™ll show how visionOS 26 can help you tell impactful immersive and interactive stories. You'll learn how to frame your creative ideas for formats like Apple Immersive Video and explore real-world examples from past productions. You'll discover how to design for spatial interaction and tell stories that make the audience part of your experience. And you'll find out how to use SharePlay and spatial Personas to help people connect over your ideas.
On Day 2, weâ€™ll dive deep into Apple Immersive Video and Apple Spatial Audio. You'll discover how to create entirely new media experiences, get started with Apple Immersive Video, explore new production workflows, and dig into previous Apple Immersive productions.
To explore additional sessions, appointments, and workshops, view the full schedule of Meet with Apple activities worldwide. https://apple.co/Meet-with-Apple
More Apple Developer resources: Video sessions: https://apple.co/VideoSessions Documentation: https://apple.co/DeveloperDocs Forums: https://apple.co/DeveloperForums App: https://apple.co/DeveloperApp
#visionOS #VisionPro #Apple
